column2: "Hey, got a minute? We're in real trouble here. Could you talk to Shiva?"
"Hmm. Can't put my finger on what, but there's just something about your face. Makes me think of you as my comrade."

"Wonder what kind of comrade...
Ah well, it'll do for now. How do you like it, comrade?"
"Don't know why, but every time a guy comes past here and sees me with Mother and Shiva, he gives me this absolutely filthy look."
"And the way they're muttering, something's going to boil over soon. You'd better get this sorted out soon."

"ところで僕はこのパーティーで
どういう役割になるんだい、センパイ？"

"道化師……つまりピエロってこと？
アハハ、なぜか妙にしっくりくるけど
……そいつ、クリスマスで何する役？"

"いやあ。本当に、サ。
困っていたんだよねえ、僕。"

"困ってた。ほーんと困ってた。
そこに現れてくれたのが
センパイ、君ってワケだ。"

"お見事、お見事。
まったく、ハデにやってくれちゃって。
楽しかったよ、センパイ！"
